creditline: Lent by the Frederick R. Weisman Art Museum, University of Minnesota, Minneapolis
description: tall rounded rectangular jar, round foot; wide rim, tapered body toward rim and foot; brown glazed cover; body of jar decorated by brown band at center with brown spots on field above and below
dimension: H.10 x W.5-7/16 x D.5-1/4 in., overall
text: MacKenzie selected this covered jar by his former student Randy Johnston for the richness of the surface which has been cut and painted with irregular slip. The interaction of elements on each surface and the stability and strength of form also appeal to MacKenzie.
title: Lidded jar
